original_text: Now after the death of Jehoiada came the princes of Judah, and made obeisance to the king. Then the king hearkened unto them.
korean_text: 여호야다가 죽은 후에 유다 방백들이 와서 왕에게 절하매 왕이 그들의 말을 듣고

sentences.original_text: Now after the death of Jehoiada
and made obeisance to the king
Then the king hearkened unto them
